title: Amore: Short Stories of Love Around the World
description: Delve inside the pages of this book for five uniquely entertaining short stories of couples who fall in love in some unusual situations around the world.Imagine unexpectedly meeting your lost love years later, while strolling on a sun-kissed beach, or reigniting your passion with a vacation after years of taking each other for granted?Each story tells a tale of something that has been lost and then found once more, sometimes from right under the noses of the protagonists, and each delivers just the right blend of heady romance and steamy passion.What will be the outcome of a chance meeting in Paris? And how will a wealthy woman react when the man she thinks is the restaurant owner turns out to be just a lowly cook?This collection delivers as many surprises as it does moments of sheer reading pleasure. Download now and immerse yourself in stories of love that are full of shocking revelations and astonishing coincidence.
author: Jen Bombardo
